alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 22 at 4:49PM PST until November 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog is currently mainly along OR Highway 11 northeast through the Walla Walla area. The fog may become freezing fog in areas where temperatures drop below freezing tonight and Thursday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
